description: Smint.io allows businesses to create various types of content portals, including brand portals, media centers, press portals, and content buying portals. From these portals, users can access and retrieve various brand assets, such as images, documents, videos, and audio files.

Users who want to back up or transfer a portal's data can export that data as a SIPA file. Each SIPA file contains a copy of all the assets uploaded to a content portal. It also includes configuration and metadata files that describe the portal's page structure and resources.
